CREATE TABLE "user" (
  "user_id" INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
  "user_name" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  "user_type" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  "email" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  "password" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  "address" VARCHAR(255),
  "phone" VARCHAR(13) NOT NULL,
  "profile_img" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  "join_date" DATE,
  "verify_token" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  "OTP" INTEGER NOT NULL,
  "verify_status" SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, -- 0 = NO, 1 = YES
  "life" SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 5,
  "last_attempt_time" BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  "account_available" SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, -- 0 - Banned, 1 - Available
  PRIMARY KEY ("user_id")
);
